set.name: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Type
property.value: Neo Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Neo Evolution: You may put it on one of your Jokers. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ You can't cast spells. ■ Each of your other creatures gets +10000 power, breaks 2 additional shields, and attacks creatures if able.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Type
property.value: DG Field

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each of your turns, reveal the top card of your deck and add it to your hand. Then you may put a creature that costs less than that card from your hand into the battle zone. If you don't or can't, choose one of your shields and put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Type
property.value: Neo Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Light creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ While this creature is tapped, your opponent's creatures don't untap at the start of their turn. ■ Whenever this creature untaps, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and untaps it.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may untap this creature to change your opponent's creatures attack to this creature or one of your tapped creatures. ■ Labyrinth: If you have more shields than your opponent, they can't cast spells that cost 5 or less.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Type
property.value: Neo Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Nature creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, they attack this creature if able. ■ If this creature battles, if it is a Neo Evolution Creature, you may put both creatures into their owner's mana zone instead of battling.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Type
property.value: Neo Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Neo Evolution: You may put it on one of your Jokers. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) ■ If you have a total of 4 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, this creature gets "power attacker +6000" and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "power attacker +6000 and "double breaker" gets +6000 power while attacking and breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and reveal one of them. Your opponent chooses the revealed card or the 2 non-revealed cards. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Type
property.value: Neo Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Dragon Guild/Metallica

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Labyrinth: When this creature is destroyed, if you have more shields than your opponent, draw a card. Then you may put a light creature that costs 8 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ You may look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, and the other into your shields face down. {SUPER}: Each of your light cards put into your hand from your shields get "shield trigger" until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Type
property.value: Neo Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Water creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owners hand. If this is a Neo Evolution Creature, your opponent can't summon creatures that costs the same as that creature during his next turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard any number of water cards from your hand. For each card you discarded, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-02 All So Truly B・A・D Labyrinth!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Return one of your untapped creatures to your hand. Then your opponent chooses one of their untapped creatures and returns it to their hand. {SUPER}: Return all creatures to their owner's hand.

(A creature that has "double breaker breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total cost 8 or less. {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER}: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, put a non-evolution fire creature into the battle zone. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures and battle it with that creature. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
